lead_paragraph: BRADEMAS--John. The trustees, faculty, and staff of NYU Langone Medical Center are deeply saddened by the death of former New York University (NYU) president John Brademas, a man who made singular contributions to NYU's history and direction. We extend our deepest condolences to the family and friends of Mr. Brademas including his wife, Mary Ellen, his sister, Eleanor Brazeau, his three stepchildren, John Briggs, Katherine Goldberg, and Jane Murray, and his six step-grandchildren. Kenneth G. Langone, Chair, Board of Trustees, and Robert I. Grossman, MD, Dean and CEO 1/3
